name: Rosqui Escape
description:
Due to these harsh times of pandemic.
I decided that I had to learn something
that would complement my aspiration,
which is be a pixelartist.
So during these two weeks I decided to learn to code,
and to start with something simple a endless run.
This little game came out,
inspired by the stereotype of cops and donuts.
I hope you like it and you have a good time. :)
